title: PR00045455 - Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP)
description:
Description
Die Anforderung muss bis zum 26.08.2019 umgesetzt sein (Stand 6.3.2019).
Diese Story dient zunächst als Platzhalter und als Sammler für Informationen zu dem demnächst kommenden CR zur Realisierung von RDAP.
INFORMATIONEN zu RDAP (aus dem Foliensatz im Anhang)
The Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP) is a protocol designed to replace the existing WHOIS protocol and provides the following benefits:
Standardized query, response and error messages
Secure access to data (i.e., over HTTPS)
Extensibility (e.g., easy to add output elements)
Bootstrapping mechanism to easily find the authoritative server for a given query
Standardized redirection/reference mechanism (e.g.,from a thin registry to a registrar)
Builds on top of the well-known web protocol HTTP
Internationalization support for registration data
Optionally enables differentiated access (e.g., limited access for anonymous users, and full access for authenticated users)
Weitere Informationen gibt es auch hier:
https://about.rdap.org/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Registration_Data_Access_Protocol
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7482 (Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP) Query Format)
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7480 (HTTP Usage in the Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP))
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7483 (JSON Responses for the Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP))
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7484 (Finding the Authoritative Registration Data (RDAP) Service)
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7481 (Security Services for the Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP))
